thread.section_title: TShirt Studio Reviews | Read Customer Service Reviews of tshirtstudio.com
thread.title: shortpants 82

author: shortpants 82
title: shortpants 82
text:
When I received my t-shirt. It came to me in an unsatisfactory condition. When I put the t-shirt on there was a big thread hanging down from the inside, and as I looked at it there was a hole about an inch and a half long in underneath the armpit.
But food distribution time, and good cost too. But unfortunately I've had to have the t-shirt sewn as I need it for work
